meta.content: More than just a school, we treat each other like family! See what we have to offer at APS!

form.name: frm

div.p: More than just a school, we treat each other like family! See what we have to offer at APS!

div.div: The mission of Arnold Public Schools is to educate students to meet the ever-changing demands of society.

div.p: Individual and small group learning opportunities maximize student achievement. Our students love to learn!
Learning through unique, hands-on experiences brings the entire world to life in Arnold Public Schools.

p.span:
P.O. Box 399 · 405 North Haskell
Arnold, NE 69120

div.p: APS is adding substitute teachers to the sub list regularly. Successful subs will meet all certification requirements set by the Nebraska Department of Education. Compensation is $95/day. Inquire at the school during regular hours.

Arnold Public Schools has an opening for a bus route/activity driver. Successful candidates will complete state requirement for CDL with a School Bus License, and will need to complete Level I training for student pick up. The School District pays for all trainings and licensing fees. Contact Joel Morgan at 308-848-2226 ext. 3 for more details.
Click here for an application to download and fill out. (classified only)

p.em: Arnold Public Schools is an equal opportunity educator and employer.
